name: appraisily-monorepo
description: Monorepo for Appraisily website and services

scripts.build:main: cd main_page && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:directory: cd art-appraiser-directory-frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:landing: cd art-appraisers-landing && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:screener: cd screener-page-module && npm install && cd .. && node scripts/build-screener.js
scripts.build:image-generation: cd image-generation-service && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run apply-patches && npm run build:image-generation && npm run generate-appraiser-images && npm run build:directory && npm run integrate-appraiser-images && npm run build:main && npm run build:landing && npm run build:screener && node scripts/merge-builds.js && npm run build:sitemap
